alert.note: Alert for Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 1:04PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Westchester and eastern Putnam Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 104 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mount Kisco, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bedford and Yorktown Heights around 115 PM EDT. Brewster and Carmel around 145 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Golden`s Bridge, Peach Lake and Pleasantville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
